ygData.subject: Re: pet question
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, a little more confusion...  I am running scsi drives (u2w 7200rpm) and i see no improvement in zoneing over my ide friends so....  Here are my thoughts:
ygData.messageBody:
Well, a little more confusion... I am running scsi drives (u2w 7200rpm) and
i see no improvement in zoneing over my ide friends so.... Here are my
thoughts: cpu and connect speed make a difference, but also how many hops
you have to get to there servers also does. Also I think (but not verified)
the ammont of ppl in the zone affects zone time. I think alot of the long
zone times are on there end, and not ours, but who the hell knows, they wont
tell us shit about anything.

James

----- Original Message -----
From: Christopher King <cking@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 24, 2000 12:52 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] pet question


> From: Christopher King <cking@...>
>
> to add to the confusion:
> my pc is a PII 450mhz, 128MB ram, EIDE hard drive, STB Riva TNT 16mb card.
> I have always had slow zoning compared to most people. usually 5 secs or
> more slower.
> Until last week i had a 56k dial up.
> Last week i got 1megabit ADSL.
> I have seen NO (ZERO) zoning time improvement. I have no idea why.
sometimes
> (earlier with 56k) i would zone quickly, but very rarely.
> I would LOVE to know the real cause. My thought is I/O rates of your
> subsystem. SCSI would be faster tha EIDE, but i can't test that.
>
> All I know now is that DSL is NOT making me zone fast despite that 60ms
ping
> i get to quake servers and 500kb/s download rates i get..
> 8(
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Beth [mailto:snowjaguar@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 24, 2000 1:03 PM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] pet question
>
>
> From: Beth <snowjaguar@...>
>
> Hey,
>
> Question for the masses:
>
> I'm level 14 and about 2 bubbs from 15. I'm in green pet hell. I had
> heard the 12 level pet spell, well sucked. Do I get a reprieve at 16?
> Can I look forward to yellow pets again?
>
> This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
> tolerated

tolerated
